title: See review - new Apple TV+ series lacks vision
text:
Apple brought hipster chic to the tech industry with its sexy laptops, shiny smartphones and gummy-bear desktop computers. So conquering prestige TV with the new Apple TV + service may have looked an easy win for the Californian gadget gurus. After all, what were The Sopranos, Mad Men and Game of Thrones but perfectly engineered entertainments, obsessively designed and flawless to behold? Slightly pretentious high-end television must have struck the company as just its thing.

Alas, the Silicon Valley titan rather impales itself through the foot with its first entry into popcorn TV and a show that makes no secret of its ambition to be the new Game of Thrones. With a rumoured $15 million per episode...
description: Apple brought hipster chic to the tech industry with its sexy laptops, shiny smartphones and gummy-bear desktop computers.
